verses.roman:
jagannāthe gele tāṅra darśana nā pāimu
prabhura darśana sadā karite nārimu

synonyms: jagannāthe—to Jagannātha Purī; gele—when I go; tāṅra—His; darśana—visit; nā pāimu—I shall not get; prabhura darśana—seeing Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sadā—always; karite—to do; nārimu—I shall not be able.
translation: "When I go to Jagannātha Purī, I shall not be able to see Lord Jagannātha, nor shall I always be able to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
